alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 8:37PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Otero and southeastern Pueblo Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 836 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles south of Fowler to 16 miles southwest of Manzanola to 17 miles north of Delhi. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rocky Ford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
